mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (bathhouse_info_id, member_id, content, rating) VALUES (#{bathhouseInfoId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id AS reviewId, b.bathhouse_info_id AS bathhouseInfoId, r.content AS content, r.rating AS rating, r.created_at AS createdAt, r.updated_at AS updatedAt, m.name AS name FROM review r INNER JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id RIGHT JOIN bathhouse_info b on r.bathhouse_info_id = b.bathhouse_info_id ORDER BY review_id
